Articles.Content:
For some reason, my ships reflect off the surfaces of planets/moons. It seems to reflect off all surfaces of planets/moons. I happen to using a telescope in this case and you can see the massive reflection in the image, but if I turn to look at Kerbin the reflection of the vessel is visible as well and is also a massive size. Here is a screenshot:

 

I'm not sure what mod would be causing it, but here is my list of installed mods:

 

I appreciate any assistance!
I think this has to do with Texture replacer
